Edge



class Edge;
Author:
Harry Allen

Date:
September 20, 2014

Class representing edges between vertices.

this();
Default constructor.

this(int weight);
Constructor that initializes the edge's weight to the given accepted int.

Params:
int weight the new edge's weight

double getWeight();
Returns:
The edge's weight.

Vertex getSource();
Returns:
The edge's source.

Vertex getDestination();
Returns:
The edge's destination.

int compareTo(Edge E);
Compares this edge's weight to that of the accepted edge.

Params:
Edge E the edge to compare with

Returns:
Returns an int containing -1 if this edge is less than E, 1 if this edge is greater than E, and 0 if the edges are equal

void setWeight(double weight);
Sets the weight to the accepted double.

Params:
double weight the new weight for this edge

void setSource(Vertex source);
Sets the source to the accepted Vertex.

Params:
Vertex source the new source for this edge

void setDestination(Vertex destination);
Sets the destination to the accepted Vertex.

Params:
Vertex destination the new destination for this edge
